description: Detects threat actors proxy executing code and bypassing application controls by leveraging wmic and the `/FORMAT` argument switch to download and execute an XSL file (i.e js, vbs, etc). Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Apparently, wmic os get lastboottuptime loads vbscript.dll
name: WMIC Loading Scripting Libraries
